title: The Exciting escapades of Mr. Bean
other_title: The Exciting escapades of Mr Bean
The Exciting escapades of Mister Bean
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television comedies
description: Two further misadventures with the irrepressible Mr Bean. "The Curse of Mr Bean" sees Mr Bean visiting the local swimming pool. Excited about the prospect of a dive from the top board, he discovers he hasn't got the nerve for it. He rapidly loses his cool...and his bathers! In "Mr Bean Goes to Town", Mr Bean brings home a new television set. Having trouble with the reception, he devises a unique solution. Includes material not previously seen on television.
